column4: Hey, I was wondering what kind of support ubuntu has for ATI cards?
Does it use a package system for installing software?
read the instructions that came with it
No instructions came with it... I got it from ftp.idsoftware.com
how would I go about running fsck manually?
boot into single user mode ("recovery" I think it's called on the grub menu), remount / ro, run fsck
it doesn't, and you don't need one
are you behind a dsl router or whatever?
ubuntu runs no services by default
so unless you install extra stuff you're worried about, you don' need to worry...
some computer people are trying to sell you stuff
and windows is poorly configured by default with a variety of running and exploitable services
